name: POWER BULLET 2: THE SOURCE OF CHAOS
name_original: POWER BULLET 2: THE SOURCE OF CHAOS
description:
A  sequel to POWER BULLET, fight along with roller as he fights the evils on the realm that he is trapped on. Stronger grunts, new weapons , new look, and more to come.

GAME INSTRUCTIONS

WASD or arrow keys to roll around

click or press space to shoot

press r to reload

press 2 to throw grenade

press 3 to launch buddy!!

press q to turn sound on or off

(made on scratch.com)
